PODCAST_ADD_COMPLETION: Podcast item is added. Please refresh the page to see updated items.
PODCAST_DELETE_COMPLETION: Podcast item is removed. Please refresh the page to see updated items.
DELETE_PODCAST_DESCRIPTION: You should select podcast to delete item from podcasts list
ADD_PODCAST_DESCRIPTION: You should input podcast RSS link url to add.(Example:[TED Radio Hour Podcast] https://www.npr.org/rss/podcast.php?id=510298)
